items.sentence: Tom put Mary\'s suggestion down on his to-do list.
Tom wanted me to find out who you\'ve been dating.
Tom doesn\'t know when Mary will leave for Boston.
Tom doesn\'t know where Mary learned how to drive.
Tom doesn\'t know why Mary dropped out of college.
Tom doesn\'t like clubs where there is loud music.
Tom doesn\'t like to eat where people are smoking.
Tom doesn\'t need to go to Boston until next week.
We\'ve never actually been out on a date together.
What was Mary\'s last name before she got married?
We might not need to attend the meeting on Monday.
We were hoping something interesting would happen.
We were totally exhausted from the five-hour trip.
Were you really playing chess at 11:30 last night?
What can I do to sound more like a native speaker?
Where did you get the idea that I don\'t like Tom?
Are you planning to be at Tom and Mary\'s wedding?
I\'m grateful for what you\'ve done for my family.
Tom was the only one not invited to Mary\'s party.
Tom wasn\'t aware that Mary had already gone home.
